channel.title: Blog on Sarah Allen Reed, Goblin Queen.

item.title: Diametric No. 1: Call For Submissions
item.description: Good morning! It’s a calm day here at the ranch, and the sun is shining through the studio window. I hope your day is shining bright as well. As you’ve probably been seeing on Twitter and Instagram, I’ve been kicking around a concept of starting an anarchist literary magazine for a good minute. I’ve pitched the idea to some very good friends, and after some wonderful back-and-forth and a bit of time in the incubator, and I think today’s a great day to announce open submissions for…
